Title: Silicone Thumb Bands : "Texting Kills" ~ Retail Tub of 144 Pcs, Assorted Colors
Description: Silicone Thumb Bands : "Texting Kills" ~ Retail Tub of 144 Pcs, Assorted Colors Retail counter display tub of 144 awareness thumb bands in assorted colorsHelps raise awareness about the dangers of texting while drivingMade from 100% all new siliconeCan be worn on any finger, one size fits mostSturdy construction for long lasting durabilityFREE SHIPPING to all USA addresses! Texting while driving can be as dangerous as driving after drinking 4 beers and makes you 23 times more likely to be involved in an accident. More than 330,000 accidents occur every year due to texting while driving, resulting in 58,000 fatalities. Alarmingly, over 2/3 of all teens admit to texting and driving. Celebrities, police departments, schools, and public officials everywhere are constantly speaking out against the perils of texting while driving, but much more needs to be done to make it stop. Do your part and join the many others who are raising awareness to this growing problem by selling these black silicone thumb bands with the characters "TEXTNG KILLS" and the sliding car logo. You'll receive a retail counter display tub with 144 embossed bands in assorted random colors: pink, white, purple, blue, green and red. Your cost per piece is less than 25 cents, the bands can retail for as much as $1.00 each. Made with brand new, 100% silicone these tiny bands are comfortable to wear, look awesome, and are made to last for years.These bands are worn with the same concept as the famous LIVESTRONG bracelets for cancer awareness and other causes. These attractive thumb bands will hopefully remind the wearer to be safe on the road and wait to text until they are stopped in a safe location to do their communicating, even in an emergency. Wearing these "TEXTNG KILLS" thumb bands is a great way to silently pledge that you'll be a text free driver, and giving them to your family and friends can encourage them to do the same.
